title: S13 Ep78: A Tribute To Brad Steiger
itunes:title: A Tribute To Brad Steiger
description:
On Sunday, May 6th, 2018, Brad Steiger passed through the veil from this world and into the next. In honor of Brad's illustrious career, we are airing his last appearance with us from 2016. We talk about Real Voices, Voices From Beyond, & Parallel Dimensions with Brad one last time.

Find Brad's books at : https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradio

Today's program is brought to you exclusively by fromyouflowers.com.
